fields.name: temperature_sensor
fields.description: A DSB18B20 temperature sensor that reports a value, a single float value, once a second.

fields.name: luminosity_sensor
fields.description: A TSL2561 luminosity sensor that reports the luminosity, a single float value, once per second.

fields.name: buzzer
fields.description:
A buzzer that receives the frequency of the sound and the time it should be on.

Payload: "X,Y"
- X: the frequency (value: 1-1023)
-Y: how much time, in ms, the buzzer should be on (value: 1-1000)

fields.name: led_strip
fields.description:
An RGB LED strip for which any led can be configured individually. 

Payload: "X,R,G,B":
- X: the LED number onto which the action is reflected (value: 0-143)
- R: the brightness of the RED LED
- G: the brightness of the GREN LED
- B: the brightness of the BLUE LED

fields.name: servo_motor
fields.description:
A servo motor that takes as input the angle at which it should position itself.

Payload: "X"
- X: the angle at which the servo will position itself (value: 0-180)
